items.simpleContent: {"images":[{"width":557,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231230/2023123008105334178363.jpg","idx":0},{"width":598,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231230/2023123008105982724252.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝来到了第7天，我大概真的是完美主义者，总觉得每个字都可以更精进。先打卡，今天再练练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":889,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231229/2023122906052956630675.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝6 今日份练习，细节还要再抓抓","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":829,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231228/2023122805585548370417.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝5 看着好像比昨天又稍好点，也多了点自如感","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":627,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231227/202312270549347993867.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝4 初学不外临摹。临书得其笔意，摹书得其间架。——清·周星莲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":559,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122605392732796396.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝3 试着写大点，发现写出来后字还是偏小了。结构及对称性还是有问题，接着练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":786,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231225/2023122508073552456776.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1800,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231225/202312250807471953011.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝2 感觉帝的两条弧线就像皇袍，写的好皇袍加身，帝的气势才能出来，还是要多练。线条也要常练一下(稍洇墨)","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":714,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/202312241221398919337.jpg","idx":0},{"width":638,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/2023122412214578726570.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇字暂且这样了，开启帝字，有了几天的精临，感觉帝字上手稍轻松，只是结构还抓不好，慢慢来","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":651,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231223/2023122312184890954407.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"万事开头难，初临峄山碑也是觉得难，皇字精临一周多了，感觉没写出个完美的","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":887,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231222/2023122209040611389075.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"顺序临峄山碑，第一个皇字开始真的有被难住的感觉。被最上面的小人字头和下面的U型弧给难住，就是弧线而已，但就是写不对称，写不正，连续几天每天都有做局部练习，终于克服了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":796,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231221/2023122110530266816851.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"先写两个打卡，空了再好好练","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":584,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231220/202312201051505863624.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇6 大概的结构好像还行，再抓抓细节","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1800,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231219/2023121910565474415361.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇5 匆匆写了几个，结构还要再好好抓。连续几天奔波忙碌，还没能好好静下来攻克这个字，等忙完这两天再好好卷一卷","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":644,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231217/2023121710464471388702.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇4 出个门被风吹的偏头痛，呕吐，下午昏昏沉沉的睡了一下午，这会好转手痒又拿起笔了，就是今天这皇的头老是偏，跟偏头疼有关?","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":648,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121602322865339680.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇3 时刻记着起收笔、线条质量，结构等我慢慢抓","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":591,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231215/20231215094415230586.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇读贴跟临帖差别很大，眼高手低，皇字先进行局部专项练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4002,"height":1799,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231214/202312141044274568962.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"开启峄山碑，新上手问题多多","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":649,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/20231213070806756952.jpg","idx":0},{"width":610,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121307080679826050.jpg","idx":1},{"width":640,"height":765,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121307080714977527.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 92 弧线也满月了，横竖弧各发一张就当作阶段性总结了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":931,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121207000881296988.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day29 矩形四个角的弧度一致性感觉还差点意思","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1800,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121109024895879385.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day28 每日一卡，坚持练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":725,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231210/2023121009144100994459.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 27 要保证线条质量下笔便要找到毛笔吃住纸的感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":726,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120907154979894160.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day26 稳定应该也算一种进步","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":809,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120809114563292280.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 25 平心静气继续练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":822,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231207/2023120708330217999390.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 24 享受书写时的空和静","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":820,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120607113958484626.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 23 试着一笔写一个长弓形来锻炼手腕的灵活，好像还行，能转过来😁","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":782,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120508194592210554.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 22 坚持练习，增强手腕的灵活性","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":803,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231204/2023120407543916038620.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 21 弧线也一样，不要忘记保持线条的质感","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":940,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231203/2023120307142368227375.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 20 感觉到手腕有了点灵活性，弧转也多了点轻松自如","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":855,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120207465328283138.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线19 练呗，练着练着曾经很别扭的转弯处就不那么别扭了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":573,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120108121741495399.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":696,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120108122415449210.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 80 弧线18 似乎找到一点手腕的灵活性(窃喜)，最近书写时间大都用在弧线上，线条拉的少了，今天多拉几根横线","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":862,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231130/2023113006310508433524.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 18 要找到手腕的灵活性唯多练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":858,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231129/2023112907392568623980.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 17 接着练 持续练 锻炼手腕控笔灵活性和运行连贯性","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":636,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112807242326366540.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 16 弧转处稍提笔放慢速度运用手腕的转动来调峰，确实不容易绞笔，只是手腕依然觉得有点僵硬，没有自如感","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":924,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231127/2023112707360436542431.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线 Day15 弧形相当锻炼手腕的灵活性，感觉自己缺少这种灵活自如，所以又多看了几遍老师弧线的视频，找找感觉再接着多练","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":653,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231126/202311260202106379184.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线day14 高执笔后有那么一刻觉得经脉被打通了，手上变得轻松，力也不再是手上的拙力，感觉是通过肩膀、大臂、小臂传到手上再到笔尖。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":705,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/2023112511325127112669.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧Day13, 执笔高度调到了笔管顶端，觉得轻松了很多","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":900,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231124/2023112405375541198884.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线Day 12 平心静气慢慢来","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":702,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112309034079062211.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧 day11 在不断练习中提高，坚持!","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":743,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231122/2023112205441317171670.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧 Day10 矩形感觉还是不能轻松自如，继续多加练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112107262333358784.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧9 抽空看了课程中大部分的书法史，一方面练手上功夫，一方面提升认知。阳光明媚的一天！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":693,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231120/202311200804512179168.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 69 弧8 好像突破了矩形接笔错位的问题😊 拉了几根竖线，感觉状态依然在😄 新的一周加油！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":859,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231119/2023111904561402089573.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线第7天 矩形转弯处弧线角度控制的还不够一致，仍需多加练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":778,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231118/2023111806455037488468.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线day 6 日日精进,则无有不成,久久为之,遂未来可期","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":679,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231117/2023111708403654363269.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线第五天 聚精会神，心平气和，静而力健，能达书之妙境","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":720,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231116/2023111605163491933588.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线第四天 我悟了，弧线关键在于转弯处稍提笔，捻管调锋，始终保持中锋书写。今天的小圆圈和矩形感觉比昨天又有点进步，继续加油！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":750,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231115/2023111505184844489708.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线第三天 小圆圈比昨天顺手一点，画了几串糖葫芦😃😃，就是大小不一，也不够椭圆，矩形接笔也还会错位，继续加油练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231114/2023111407385669436386.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"弧线第二天，小圆圈转笔有点转不过来的感觉，矩形接笔也常错位，继续多久练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111308341445718754.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 62 开启弧线的练习，新的挑战，\"慢\"字诀依然是关键。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":803,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231112/2023111206420527183814.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":721,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231112/2023111206421030020318.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖线Day 29 慢慢拉，感受克阻力拉皮筋的感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":826,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231111/2023111109465375932674.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":789,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231111/2023111109465940127124.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖线28天，今天试着拉细线条，感觉专注力更高了，整个世界安静的只有笔尖在纸上的细微摩擦声，喜欢也沉醉于这种安静。不过相较于峄山碑的线条还是粗了不少。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":797,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/2023111001174554219182.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":803,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/20231110011750735108.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 59 拉呀拉皮筋，有时真的拉不动的感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":834,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231109/2023110902542765630337.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":858,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231109/2023110902543251519444.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 58 饱蘸墨可以减少很多起笔绞笔、行笔单边毛糙和接笔的烦恼。我一般蘸墨时会整个毛笔头都蘸饱磨，然后再刮掉多余的墨汁，这时候整个毛笔的弹性就比较好，行笔时笔根部和笔肚就是笔尖的墨源。我一根线条的长度在20-24cm直径，基本上不用接笔。当然，洗毛笔时也一定要把毛根部洗干净，要不根部因磨聚集会变硬。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":745,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231108/2023110802494099917251.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 57 横57竖25 今天偷个懒少拉几根😊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":876,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231107/2023110707294387298431.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":767,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231107/20231107072943883215.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 56 以前狭隘了，眼睛只盯着楷、行、草，最近去了解篆书，看篆书大家的作品，才发现篆书之美以及篆书的魅力，也让我拉线条有了极大的热情。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":720,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231106/2023110606340968518574.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":801,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231106/2023110606340972470334.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 55  拉线条时如能感觉到\"如有物以拒之，竭力而与之争\"，线条便被注入了笔力，不会只浮于表面了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":833,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110509283651263838.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":855,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110509283650267923.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 54 要想线条质量好，墨的浓度不可少。新墨汁在毛边纸上有点洇墨，换了宣纸依然有点，把墨汁倒进砚台加墨条研磨后果真好多了，线条又恢复了稳定。趁天气正好去赏个秋😊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":814,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231104/202311040557141719071.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":796,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231104/2023110405572503696593.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 53 试了新墨水红星和云头艳，感觉浓度都差一丢丢，入纸阻力少了点","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":873,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110307530650974594.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":804,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110307531209850049.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 52 宿墨宿的有点久了😅，固化了，墨汁小微粒粘在笔尖上，导致线条的边缘有微小的锯齿形","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231102/202311020641074581190.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":746,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231102/202311020641125489810.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 51 \"善用笔力者多骨，不善笔力者多肉。多骨微肉者谓之筋书，多肉少骨者谓之墨猪\" ","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":820,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110105225910716022.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":853,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110105230415395162.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 50 拉呀拉呀拉皮筋，行进中感觉到线条像皮筋一样有了弹性，有了张力，好像停下来就要弹回去了，继续拉感觉线条绷紧了一样一点点被拉长，找到这种感觉，线条的质量便不会差了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":660,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231031/2023103106220015819619.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":797,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231031/2023103106220606327937.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 49 难，把每条线条都拉直还是觉得难","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":845,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231030/2023103007361156776236.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":842,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231030/2023103007361668549422.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 48 打完卡开启新一周的工作，不负生活亦不负心中热爱","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":769,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231029/2023102908211001898546.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":955,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231029/2023102908211572436705.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 47 不知不觉一个半小时过去了，总共拉了30根线条，速度倒算是慢的，但有的线条质量感觉不满意。当尽力写还不能满意，那就是功力不够，继续努力吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":721,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102811540002211514.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":744,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/202310281154059283346.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 46 书法线条练习是基本功里的基本功，如度曲者之拉空弦，歌唱者之练喉音，其万象变化，皆由此出。不急不躁继续练基本功。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":761,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231027/2023102701500389789095.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":768,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231027/2023102701500927888041.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 45 力求 静(心静)、慢(行笔慢)、稳(力度稳)","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":722,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231026/2023102609185999966945.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":755,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231026/2023102609190533794168.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 44 克阻力而行，拉呀拉呀拉皮筋","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":741,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231025/2023102509291106419511.jpg","idx":0},{"width":845,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231025/2023102509291626615573.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 43 横43竖11，今天打卡晚了，努力坚持","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":804,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231024/2023102407315472674448.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":850,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231024/2023102407320018656661.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 42 质的飞跃需要量的积累，继续拉线条","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":830,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102308184180165686.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":777,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102308184786898894.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 41 横41天竖9天 多思、多练、多悟","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":831,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102208404047879647.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102208404609345052.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 40 有时会有种错觉，觉得头低下去，离纸笔近一点意念能更好的控制笔力，但实际上是手臂就受限了，不能舒展开，所以正确的姿势也很重要。今日竖线感觉比昨日稍好一点。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":817,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231021/2023102110402321363976.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":753,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231021/2023102110402323746809.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 39 我在练习\"慢\"字功路上遇到的拦路虎: 1)心态不够放松，心里紧张身体就会紧绷，手臂也是紧张的状态，慢不下来或者慢下来手抖；2)功力不够，稳定性不够，提按控制不好，慢下来不是提的太过就是按的太重；3)纸不好慢下来洇墨，或者墨太淡，洇墨、笔尖飘","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":791,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231020/2023102003564696237941.jpg","idx":0},{"width":732,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231020/202310200356523134199.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 38 练习竖线后对收笔有了更直观的认识，行笔完成时驻锋，把笔尖作为指点，使笔肚逐渐立起后回锋弹起，完成后笔锋是恢复原状的，这样便于下一笔的书写。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":729,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231019/2023101905185340499154.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":810,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231019/2023101905190088621145.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 37 坚持练习，坚持学习，坚持打卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":694,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231018/2023101805551399127093.jpg","idx":0},{"width":560,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231018/2023101805551988375110.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 36 努力不一定立杆见效，但不会白费","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":885,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231017/2023101706011142022850.jpg","idx":0},{"width":782,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231017/2023101706011698516195.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 35 聚精会神，心平气和，静而力健，能达书之妙境。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":803,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231016/2023101605514075638448.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":664,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231016/2023101605514624143339.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 34 今天用的宿墨，过浓，线条阻涩，写写就毛边，调剂后重新写便好多了，故墨还是要浓淡适宜才行。竖第二天，粗细不均，间隔不等，还要多多练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":844,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231015/2023101509482971317454.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":855,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231015/2023101509483735287565.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 33 横线特意计了下时，每条2分10秒左右。线条无论胖瘦，重在要有其骨，而要写出\"骨\"，就需慢，感受到拉皮筋、逆水行舟或锥画沙的感觉，线条的质感就出来了。竖线第一天，还在协调手、腕、臂、肩中。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":754,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231014/2023101401311321747708.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 32 秋风送来阵阵桂花香，一个惬意的周六午后，继续拉线条。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":749,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101307523031159131.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 31 今日练习拉细线条，有点紧张，不够放松","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":816,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231012/2023101207571777721221.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 30 \"慢\"字功有了新的突破，可以随心所欲想多慢就多慢了😄","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231011/2023101104491864877526.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 29 日悟日新，日新月异，快满一个月啦","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":818,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231010/2023101008361682738416.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 28 能慢下来稳的住算是有了进步","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":909,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231009/2023100907354405380820.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 27 继续练习\"慢\"字诀，放松和心法果真很重要。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":902,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231008/2023100807154615013799.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 26 \"慢\"是考验内功的，尽量放慢再放慢，也还是没能达到2分钟一根线条。继续练功提升!","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":773,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231007/2023100709074925023438.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 25 喜欢上了拉线条的感觉，手也感觉越来越稳😉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":852,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231006/2023100607281946458725.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 24 古人云:\"发笔处便要提的起，不使自偃，乃是千古不传话\"。起笔后让笔锋提锋运行。有用锋一分着纸，其书纤劲；着用腰部三分，其书丰腴，不可用力使锋压死而行，要让\"书之使笔，率不令过腰节以上\"。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":760,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231005/2023100507050820180463.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 23 清晨是适合练字的，秋风清凉，鸟鸣婉转，一切从安静中慢慢复活，美好的一天开始了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231004/2023100402344410345812.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 22 第一次有了拉橡皮筋的感觉，这也许大概是内力有所提升了😉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":828,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231003/2023100309212288129775.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 21 今天又是要赶路的一天，早点打卡，但不免有点急躁了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":845,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231002/2023100209515531016239.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 20 完美依然遥远，在追求的路上孜孜不倦","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":643,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231001/2023100110062191696668.jpg","idx":0},{"width":960,"height":592,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231001/2023100110062770848197.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 19 出门为方便带了自制的小砚台，但太浅，不好磨墨，水平不够墨淡影响手感","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":708,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230930/2023093008034214573965.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 18 工欲善其事必先利其器。出门为方便携带，便带了墨条，但又没有耐心磨墨，墨汁太淡，洇墨是一个问题，还有就是笔锋与纸之前阻力不够，笔尖容易飘，有点没眼看🙈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":717,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230929/202309290533037477408.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 17 中秋快乐！千里共婵娟～～～","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1800,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230928/2023092809033722985662.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 16 放假思绪也放飞了，笔下就不稳了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2790,"height":1800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230927/2023092709062090454956.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 15 欲速而不达，不急不躁，坚持练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1790,"height":2079,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230926/2023092609072004975150.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 14 平心静气，坚持练习，每天进步一点点","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1800,"height":2237,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230925/2023092508370993646771.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 13 放松后反而觉得写的比较顺，线条也还比较能入眼。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1778,"height":3036,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230924/2023092412125890762733.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 12 笔力的控制还是有问题，线条写着写着就变粗了，路漫漫啊～","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3076,"height":1800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230923/2023092312122635173555.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 11 先放下写匀称和平直的执念，调整呼吸，将绷紧的神经放松下来，在一呼一吸之间感受笔锋在纸上的运动。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3051,"height":1800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230922/2023092209014005391619.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 10 感觉没有进步，还是要多看多思多练多悟","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1800,"height":2496,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230921/2023092108243324080073.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 9 掌、腕、肘、身各种动作须形成一个协调的整体，才能达到黄庭坚的\"心能转腕，手能转笔，书字便如人意\"的境界。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1660,"height":1987,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230920/2023092005105482135090.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 8 肩和手臂还是紧张的状态，不够放松","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1759,"height":2702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230919/2023091905143397226654.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 7 手还不够稳，继续努力～～～","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2008,"height":1443,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230918/2023091807372358711674.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 6 意会与笔达之间隔着山海，我要翻过⛰️跨过海～","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2803,"height":1800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230917/2023091710235165983288.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 5 昨晚听完直播后反思发现自己也有折腕的问题，今天调整执笔姿势，同时放慢速度，但一条横线最慢也要1分钟半，慢不到2分钟。路漫漫其修远兮，吾将上下而求索。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1577,"height":1454,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230916/2023091605285396486480.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 4 唯有多练方能有进步，唯有多练才有悟","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1860,"height":1799,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091506495519890248.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 3 手、腕、肩依然紧张，继续修炼内功","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2109,"height":1799,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230914/2023091401294543028353.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 2 写横线呼吸都是紧张的，谁懂? 大概只有初学者","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2595,"height":1799,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230913/2023091311021448825915.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"Day 1 从横线开始，手抖，线条间隔也不均匀","hasMore":false}
